enter_business_name_page_title: What is the name of the business?
enter_business_name_page_title_info: If you're a sole trader, you should give your own name if you do not have a different business name that you trade under.

enter_business_name_validation_errors.BUSINESS_NAME_LENGTH: Business name must be 80 characters or less
enter_business_name_validation_errors.BUSINESS_NAME_INVALID_CHARACTER: Business name must contain only valid characters
